document.full_text: japan's nuclear crisis will influence where the united states builds future nuclear power plants, and the operation of a facility near new york city will be reviewed in the wake of the disaster, u.s. energy secretary steven chu said on sunday.
document.title: japan quake may alter where u.s. builds nuke plants
lines_and_colors: japan's nuclear crisis will influence where the united states builds future nuclear power plants, and the operation of a facility near new york city will be reviewed in the wake of the disaster, u.s. energy secretary steven chu said on sunday.
